name: Poisoned Sky(Demo)
description:
Poisoned Sky is a single-player card game about fighting destructive industrialists with the power of nature. You play as a spirit-summoning shaman, calling upon the spirits of the land to aid you in defending the natural world.

The current build of the game is somewhat bare bones, a few of the assets are placeholders, there's no audio, and the game lacks an awful amount of polish, but it's fully playable.

Right now we have 30 cards to play with, and five opponents to play against.
